features: Intensive Hydration Conditioner: This SheaMoisture rinse-out hair conditioner instantly detangles damaged hair while infusing with intense moisture
HYDRATE & REPLENISH DRY, DAMAGED HAIR: This rich hair conditioner, blended with restorative oils, helps to nourish and soften dry, damaged hair for a soothing hair care experience
KEY INGREDIENTS in this sulfate free Shea Moisture hair conditioner: Manuka Honey, Mafura Oil, Fig Extract
USAGE: Work this moisturizing hair conditioner through hair from root to ends. Leave on for 3 minutes, then rinse
This sulfate free conditioner is blended with Fair Trade Shea Butter
This hydration conditioner is formulated with no sulfates, no parabens, no phthalates, no mineral oil, no animal testing and no petroleum
body.description: This SheaMoisture rinse-out sulfate free conditioner instantly detangles while infusing hair with intense moisture. Blended with Shea Butter, Mafura and Baobab Oils, this product helps to soften dry, damaged hair, and helps to restore manageability, leaving hair soft, shiny and easy to style. Key Ingredients in this collection are: Manuka Honey, Mafura Oil and Fig Extract. Formulated with no sulfates, no parabens, no phthalates, no mineral oil, no animal testing, and no petroleum. Antioxidant-rich African Rock Fig helps boost hydration while protecting hair from environmental influences. Leaves hair soft, shiny and easy to style. This SheaMoisture Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Conditioner has everything you need to keep your hair looking vibrant. To use, work this moisturizing deep conditioner through your hair from root to ends. Leave on for approximately three minutes, and then rinse thoroughly. SheaMoisture's Story: SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker, a pioneering mother of four and an entrepreneur, who sold Shea Butter, African Black Soap and homemade beauty preparations in Sierra Leone in 1912. We honor her vision by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SheaMoisture Manuka Honey & Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration sulfate free conditioner helps to soften dry, damaged hair, and helps to restore manageability, leaving hair soft, shiny and easy to style.

Pamper Dry, Natural Hair This sulfate-free conditioner is made for those who need a strong deep conditioner for natural hair that's too dry. Together, We Give Back With every purchase, you support our mission to reinvest back in our communities. Tried, True and Cruelty-Free Tried on friends and family for generations--never on animals. SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker We honor the vision of this pioneering mother and entrepeneur by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa.

Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Shampoo Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Intensive Hydration Hair Masque Manuka Honey and Mafura Oil Twist-Defining Custard Main Benefit This sulfate-free shampoo cleanses hair follicles with a luxurious lather that sweetly pampers hair with natural nutrients and moisturizers. Provides intense conditioning for hair that is thirsty for moisture, especially curly hair. Moisture-rich custard that envelopes dry hair to soften, smooth and produce well-defined, frizz-free twists and twist-out styles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very impressed with this product. Nice scent and my hair feels great. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made my hair really soft
reviews.reviewText: For months I’ve been using all sorts of conditioning creams, conditioners and detanglers for my dehydrated/ knotted hair. I ended up damaging my hair more than helping it. This is the first conditioner that made a difference right off the first use and I didn’t need a detangler after the shower. It’s an amazing product. I highly recommend. Made my hair really soft and smooth. Also smells amazing!! 1000/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perhaps you, too, have tried many products, all prices, lots of promises.Finally found this which does what I was searching for. Actually soft instead of frizz. Limits the tangles. Good price.Everyone's hair is different. Mine: coarse, curly, very dry. This works to ease all of that. I use it for co-shampooing in place of regular shampoo. 2x per week (but I do not live in a grimy city). I also leave it on for longer than recommended, figuring the longer it soaks in, the better.Very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Leaves hair very soft
reviews.reviewText: I already tried most of the products of this brand and I can say that the conditioners never disappointed me. They all leave my hair extremely soft and it is so easy to style and brush them in the following days. I chose this conditioner because of its specific benefits listed on the bottle, and I have been noticing visible improvements in my hair, it is more hydrated and less fragile. One thing I don't like, and for which I wouldn't choose this product again, is the scent, but this depends on personal taste. In summary, I would recommend this product because it really gets the job done even though the scent is not the best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful scent, leaves my hair soft and manageable. Leaves hair shiny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not so sure about this product.
reviews.reviewText: I bought the shampoo in this line and LOVE it. Thought the conditioner would have to be fabulous as well. I honestly believe the shampoo does better than the conditioner. I don’t feel as much slip with the conditioner, and my hair feels no more conditioned than with just the shampoo alone after using the conditioner. Maybe there is something in the conditioner that my hair doesn’t like. I don’t know. I bought the hair mask in this line also and am keeping my fingers crossed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It deeply nourishes my hair from top to bottom! I have curly, oily hair, and this product deeply condition my curls without adding weight on them and without making them oily (which sometimes it happens with other products)! Really recommend it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I loved the con ditioner! Made my hair so soft and it smell great!! Will order again soon!!

I have purchased some of the expensive products and it has been the same outcome, hair is thinning and losing all of its luster, as well hair loss.Since trying out this product, first off, I thought I ordered 1 bottle of conditioner and I received a case of them (awesome!), the product is the perfect consistency for my wild wavy textured hair. It's not too thick or too thin. It smells lovely and doesn't leave a build-up. I was very pleased and will stick with this, after I'm done the bottles I have. I read the info on the bottle so a big shout out and thanks to momma bear for this product!

No es para pelo graso, es excelente para el pelo rizado que tiende a resecarse. Lo uso con el shampoo sin sulfatos de la marca y es un combo maravilloso. Mi pelo se ve aún mejor al segundo o tercer día de lavarlo y acondicionarlo, entonces lo intercalo con otro shampoo con sulfatos y la crema de tratamiento de esta marca. Los tres son fabulosos.

It's a good conditioner, unlike shampoo, it makes hair smooth and shine. I read that some people complain about side effects on scalp, but I can't relate to that because conditioner is not meant to be used there so I didn't.However, what I don't like is the bottle, in the picture - with pump, in reality - without, which causes some trouble in using the product, because the conditioner has very thick consistence and it's not the kind of bottle that will easily stand upside down.
Super Feuchtigkeitsspendender Conditioner! Beschwert nicht und hat einen milden & frischen Geruch.

Cet après-shampoing de chez Shea Moisture est divin et sent délicieusement bon !La texture est idéale, liquide mais avec une bonne consistance, très brillante et fluide tout en gardant un peu de forme. Le produit est facile d'application, et englobe sans problème la fibre capillaire. Les résultats sont là dès le premier lavage: Un cheveu galbé, nourri, brillant et souple. De plus, pour les personnes aux cheveux bouclés/crépus, vous aurez droit à une définition intense de vos boucles. Le démêlage n'est plus une galère, et presque un moment de détente, si on ajoute à ça un petit massage du crâne !MERCI !Shea moisture est une marque qui a su se créer une place dans le milieu assez fermé des produits capilaires principalement destinés aux possesseurs de cheveux crépus/bouclés, connus pour être les plus difficiles à maintenir. Ce produit leur rend absolument honneur et respecte l'image de la marque qui se veut respectueuse du cheveux et transparente.Et en plus de ça, une partie des revenus de la marque vont pour soutenir des associations qui luttent contre la pauvreté, et aider des petits business. Que demander de plus ?J'approuve à 100% et recommande les yeux fermés. Foncez!(n'hésitez pas à laisser un petit "utile" si mon avis a pu vous aider! (: )
